name: Marble Roll
description:
Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys to move around

This is literally the first time I've EVER attempted coding or using the Godot engine, but I'm having fun! I'll be updating the project as I finish it.

Release 0.1 - Player movement and level grid layout

Release 0.5 - added enemies and expanded the level area

                       added game over conditions

                      updated camera view

Release 1.0 - added pickups

                      added win screen

                     added counter and game conditions

                    I made my first game in Godot!
